game.name: Streetlight Syndicate
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A casual, story-driven incremental game set in 1920s New York. Build your criminal empire from speakeasies to protection rackets, fight rival hitmen, meet colorful characters, and become the city's most powerful crime lord.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A casual, story-driven incremental game set in 1920s New York. Build your criminal empire from speakeasies to protection rackets, fight rival hitmen, meet colorful characters, and become the city's most powerful crime lord.
